featureName: Upgrade Persona E2E Suites to Dual-Browser
description: Enable dual-browser (Chromium + Firefox) coverage for persona E2E test suites, unblocking downstream testing work (telemetry, visual validation).
note: Issue #11 COMPLETE (2025-11-26). Created dual-browser stateful projects (stateful-chromium, stateful-firefox). Updated CI workflows to run both projects. Fixed Firefox navigation timeouts with page.waitForURL() and extended timeouts. All 72 tests pass on both browsers (Chromium: 4.6m, Firefox: 40.9m). Documentation updated (runbook, Connection Guide, testing summaries).
